titleStmt.title: By the Lords Justices of Ireland. A proclamation. Sydney, Tho. Coningsby. Whereas the rebells in Conaught and Munster notwithstanding his Majestys gratious declarations of mercy towards them: ...
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lords Justices and Council.
Coningsby, Thomas Coningsby, Earl, 1656?-1729.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Crook assignee of Benjamin Took printer to the King and Queen at thier Majesties printing-house on Ormonde-Key,

notesStmt.note: "Given at their Majesties castle of Dublin the 26th. day of September 1690.".
Against sheltering or corresponding with rebels.--Steele.
Steele notation: Arms 201. Munster and Majesties.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
